KeyPoints.description: Water is the element of self preservation, they focus less on offense and more on staying alive and keeping attackers off their backs

Passives.name: Fountain of Youth
Passives.effect: Water cannot be attacked in quick succession

Special.name: Flood
Special.type: Submerge target in a flood dealing heavy damage, preventing them from attacking water for 5 seconds

Ultimate.name: Riptide
Ultimate.effect: Regenerate 50% health of your castle as well as gain +20% Citizens in your kingdom

KeyPoints.description: Fire is the most aggressive and offensive element, defense is secondary to them and they focus on taking down opponents as quickly as possible

Passives.name: Set your heart ablaze!
Passives.effect: Start with less health, but deal more damage

Special.name: Firenado
Special.type: A very powerful fire attack that can leave burns on your opponent for a few seconds. Attacking opponents with burns causes them to receive extra damage. Water cannot be burned. Ice burns for longer.

Utility.name: Heat wave
Utility.effect: Increase crit rate by 5% and crit damage by 10% For 10 seconds

KeyPoints.description: Air is an element of crowd control. They focus on keeping every element on the board in an uncomfortable position at the same time they are the only element that can attack multiple elements and apply pressure consistently. Long game is their friend

Passives.name: Embrace of Winds
Passives.effect: Air can attack multiple enemies at once with one attack

Passives.name: A Gust of Envy
Passives.effect: Some attacks directed towards air have a small chance to deflect the damage to another kingdom, even the attacker’s

Special.name: Thick Fog
Special.type: Deals moderate damage while also obstructing the targets vision making it difficult for them to see their inventory for a few seconds

Utility.name: Birds Eye View
Utility.effect: Temporarily displays every kingdoms shield health, citizen count and revenue

Ultimate.name: Dust Bunnies
Ultimate.effect: Send small dust bunnies to every kingdom to slowly chip away damage

KeyPoints.description: Earth is the most defensive element in the game, having the ability to boast the most powerful shield they are able to tank the majority of hits which can also make them a target, they focus on steady control and let the other elements take each other out while applying chip damage here and there

Passives.name: Rock Hard Determination
Passives.effect: Start the game with a fully intact shield

Passives.name: Distraught
Passives.effect: Earth shields slowly regen health whenever earth attacks an opponent

Special.name: Earthquake
Special.type: A very powerful attack that’s aftershock damages the kingdom adjacent to the target

Utility.name: Natural terrain
Utility.effect: All incoming damage is reduced by 20%

KeyPoints.description: Electricity is the element of speed. They focus on quick attacks and pestering their opponent as well as chaining together attacks

Passives.name: Don’t Blink
Passives.effect: All attack CD are reduced by 30%

Passives.name: AfterShock
Passives.effect: All attacks have a small chance to deal extra damage after the attack

Special.name: Hack
Special.type: Deal low damage while also stealing a small percentage of another kingdoms money and Citizens

Ultimate.name: Thundering Fate
Ultimate.effect: Remove CD on all attacks for 10 seconds

KeyPoints.description: Ice is the element of control and defense, focusing on slowing down enemies and protecting allies. They prioritize freezing and immobilizing their opponents.

Passives.name: Frozen Heart
Passives.effect: Ice takes 10% less damage from fire-based attacks.

Passives.name: Glacial Shield
Passives.effect: Gain a shield that absorbs 15% of incoming damage for 30 seconds when health falls below 30%.

Secondary.name: Blizzard
Secondary.type: Powerful ice attack that deals damage and slows down enemies

Special.name: Ice Spear
Special.type: Throw a spear of ice at the enemy, causing a freezing effect and reducing their speed for 5 seconds

Utility.name: Frost Armor
Utility.effect: Increase defense by 20% for 10 seconds when hit by an attack.

Ultimate.name: Glacial Tomb
Ultimate.effect: Freeze all enemies in the area for 5 seconds and deal 300 damage.

KeyPoints.description: Nature is the element of adaptability and toxins, focusing on environmental manipulation, poison, and creating adverse conditions for opponents.

Passives.name: Rooted in the Earth
Passives.effect: Nature heals for 5% of their health every 5 seconds in a natural environment.

Passives.name: Verdant Shield
Passives.effect: Nature absorbs 10% of incoming damage and converts it into healing over time.

Secondary.name: Acid Rain
Secondary.type: Powerful acid attack that deals damage over time

Special.name: Gastro Acid
Special.type: Attack that poisons enemies and reduces their defense for 5 seconds

Utility.name: Poison Apple
Utility.effect: Next enemny to attack Nature takes poison damage for 5 seconds.

Ultimate.name: Toxic Gas
Ultimate.effect: Release a cloud of toxic gas that poisons all enemies in the area and deals 300 damage over 5 seconds.
